channel.title: Download/Install on Pi4J
channel.description: Recent content in Download/Install on Pi4J

item.title: Direct Download
item.description: Direct downloads are not yet available. Please build the project from sources available on GitHub Or acquire the compiled artifacts from the Maven SNAPSHOT repository.

item.title: Maven Repository
item.description: Pi4J V.2 is not yet released or published to Maven Central. Please build the project from sources available on GitHub Or acquire the compiled artifacts from this Maven SNAPSHOT repository.

item.title: Installation
item.description: This project is still in development and thus no package installers are available at this time.
